TextView.android:text: Sample Diet Chart -> Breakfast: 1 apple or 1 bowl of watermelon and 2 glasses of water. -> Brunch: 1 cup of diced pineapples, 1 apple and 2 glasses of water. -> Lunch: 1 bowl of mixed cabbage, onions, cucumber, broccoli, carrots with 2 glasses of water. -> Afternoon Snack: 1/2 grapefruit and a glass of water. -> Evening Snack: 1 guava or 1 pear. ->Dinner: 1 bowl of boiled broccoli, 1/2 cup boiled beet and 2 glasses of water.
